title.rendered: View the Community Events & Information Page

content.rendered: Looking for fun activities for your kids? Check out our community events and activities section of the website.  You will find community events, summer programs,  and activities from community organizations.

excerpt.rendered: Looking for fun activities for your kids? Check out our community events and activities section of the website.  You will find community events, summer programs,  and activities from community organizations.
